name: Rocket Fight (KehosWorld)
description:
Embark in your rocket spaceship and navigate through space while you make yourself your way through enemy spaceships and asteroids.

Controls (keyboard only):

  • Arrow keys -> Movement
  • K -> Shoot and menu navigation

Technologies used:

  • Platform -> Phaser 3
  • Programming language: -> Javascript
  • Art -> Paint.net, Tiled
  • Music and sounds -> BeepBox 3.0.9
